snippet: A judge in Philadelphia ordered poll workers to cover up a mural depicting President Obama at a school in Philadelphia on Tuesday, after a photograph posted on Twitter showed voting machines set up in front of the president's image.
abstract: A judge in Philadelphia ordered poll workers to cover up a mural depicting President Obama at a school in Philadelphia on Tuesday, after a photograph posted on Twitter showed voting machines set up in front of the president's image.

headline.main: Election Monitoring in the Age of Social Media
